meanings.definition: Belonging to or associated with a male person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The boy wore his favorite hat to the park.
meanings.sent2: He held his father's hand tightly while crossing the street.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged his tail happily when his owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The lion protected his pride from any intruders.
meanings.sent5: The knight bravely defended his kingdom from enemies.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to a thing or things belonging to or associated with a male person or animal.
meanings.sent1: John forgot his lunchbox at home this morning.
meanings.sent2: The cat groomed his fur meticulously after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stole his nuts back from the mischievous raccoon.
meanings.sent4: The farmer fed his chickens before sunrise every day.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut waved goodbye to his family before the space mission.
